text: Shinko suru mono yo, anata gataga arra no michi no tame ni, shutsudo suru toki wa,(shincho ni) jitai o mikiwame, anata gata ni aisatsu suru mono ni mukatte,`anata gata wa shinjade wanai.' To itte wa naranai. Anata gata wa gense no seikatsu-jo no kie yasui zaika o motomeruga, arra no omoto ni wa, obitadashi senri-hin ga aru. Izen anata gata mo sodeattaga, arra wa onmegumi o atae rareru. Dakara (shincho ni) kodo shi nasai. Makotoni arra wa, anata gata no okonau koto o jukuchi nasa reru
